Posts.Content: It started with minimal nocturnal urine flow leading to Nightly Tamosulin(Urimax)BPH.4.Along the road a DRE,PSA's etc.In 2016 Biopsy was clear with PSA 19. 2018 PSA 64 Biopsy Gleason 3+4, post op 4+4. Jr does not salute and Diapers fashionable. MRI Pelvis & Bone scan were clear but post op cells on membrane hence Hormone injections for 2 yrs 3 monthly and 37 days radiation. Presently analysing why Jr could not stand up to the occasion and why did the immune system break down. In the scientific approach of starving the cancer a range of foods is mentioned.This is in tune with Jindal Naturopathy pointing at improper digestion leading to toxins.Howevever Aging is a factor.Lifestyle,BMI, pollution etc?? So Elp me Gawd! Regards KOJAK (YouTube.com/kopterkojak/soldier-LA Taxi Live)
Posts.Title: Post operative robotic assisted prostrate surgery 26 feb 2018

Posts.Content: Well to answer all u folks.yup if I had done a biopsy in 2017 perhaps jr would still be saluting.Both uro and self did not pursue then.Negligence or error of judgement? Fact remains adjunct one hormone inj done 3monthly 2 yrs,Radiation 37 days 3 months after surgery. More from the 'major treasure room'of my skull cave RD Oz,Immune System & Jindal Toxins. Regards KOJAK
